articleContent:
More Special Offers!
For more details, visit the Bundles section of the in-game Store.

✦Duration✦
2025-05-22 10:00 - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in First Resonance and activate the Store function.

✦[Special Offers] Tidal Festivities Bundles✦
[Reunion's Tidal Aid]
Special Offer: 1.99 USD
Bundle includes: Radiant Tide x1, Forging Tide x1, Lustrous Tide x1
※Only 1 purchase available in the current version.

[Reunion's Tidal Collection]
Special Offer: 19.99 USD
Bundle includes: Radiant Tide x10, Forging Tide x10
※Only 1 purchase available in the current version.
